item.title: Dell Optiplex 3060 Mini Tower...
item.dc:creator: qwerty
item.description: The desktop reimagined OptiPlex has 25 years of experience delivering customer-led innovation for desktops by continuously adapting to the way you work. Now featuring versatile, space-saving form factors and 8th generation Intel® Processors to unleash your full potential. Fit for the way you work Efficiency without limits: Ideal for education environments and call centers, these desktops […]
item.content:encoded:
The desktop reimagined

OptiPlex has 25 years of experience delivering customer-led innovation for desktops by continuously adapting to the way you work. Now featuring versatile, space-saving form factors and 8th generation Intel® Processors to unleash your full potential.

Fit for the way you work

Efficiency without limits: Ideal for education environments and call centers, these desktops come with the same reliability and space-saving benefits you’ve come to expect. Easy to maintain and mount, these essential desktops push productivity without getting in your way.

Adjusted to your needs: The OptiPlex Small Form Factor All-in-One Stand provides the aesthetics of an all-in-one with the ultimate display flexibility your work demands.

Uncompromising productivity

Power your workday: 8th generation Intel® Core Processors drive your workday like never before.

Push your productivity: Optional Intel® Optane Memory turns even the small, routine tasks into huge productivity gains, launching browsers and opening files faster and smoother than ever.

Go the distance: The OptiPlex 3060 features the last 802.11ac Wave 2 Wi-Fi for improved wireless performance. With Wave 2, your desktop stays connected at greater distances from your Wi-Fi router and delivers top Wi-Fi speeds for faster streaming.

Secure

Because security starts with best-in class hardware, the OptiPlex desktops feature TPM 2.0 and a chassis intrusion switch. Add custom cable covers and a security lock to protect your investment. Plus, Dell Data Security offers comprehensive threat protection from end-to-end, so you can focus more on your work and spend less time worrying about your system.

Manageable

The Dell Client Command Suite automates and streamlines system deployment, configuration, monitoring and updates and is free on all Dell commercial PCs. Optional Intel® vPro technology available on OptiPlex 7000 series and XE3, allows for remote and advanced out-of-band management capabilities.

Reliable

Your system will withstand real world conditions thanks to a durable, built-to-last chassis that’s undergone MIL-STD 810G testing. A toolless design allows for quick system access to easily upgrade and replace components like storage and memory, making your PC viable for years to come.

We’ve got your business covered

ProSupport Plus

Get anytime priority access to expert support with predictive analytics (via SupportAssist technology1) and damage protection for drops, spills, surges and more.

ProDeploy Plus

This comprehensive service provides seamless deployment of new technology. You get a single point of contact for project management including up-front planning, configuration, data migration and knowledge transfer.

Accidental Damage Service

Enjoy worry-free ownership and minimize downtime with protection from accidental drops, spills, surges and breakages. Coverage picks up where your previous warranty leaves off and is ideal for high-risk environments and mobile workforces.

Ports & Slots – Small Form Factor

1. Power Button | 2. Optical Drive (Optional) | 3. SD Media Card Reader (Optional) | 4. Universal Audio Jack | 5. USB 2.0 Ports (2) | 6. USB 3.1 Gen 1 Ports (2) | 7. Line-out | 8. HDMI Port | 9. DisplayPort | 10. USB 3.1 Gen 1 Ports (2) | 11. USB 2.0 Ports (2) | 12. PCIe Card Slots (2) | 13. Thumbscrew | 14. Serial Port (Optional) | 15. Video Port (Optional) | 16. RJ-45 | 17. Knock-out Slots for Wireless Antennas | 18. Power Connection

Ports & Slots – Tower

1. Power Button | 2. Optical Drive (Optional) | 3. SD Media Card Reader (Optional) | 4. Universal Audio Jack | 5. USB 2.0 Ports (2) | 6. USB 3.1 Gen 1 Ports (2) | 7. Line-Out | 8. DisplayPort | 9. HDMI Port | 10. USB 3.1 Gen 1 Ports (2) | 11. USB 2.0 Type-A Ports (2) | 12. PCIe Card Slots (4) | 13. Thumbscrew | 14. Serial Port (Optional)
| 15. Video Port (Optional) | 16. RJ-45 | 17. Power Connection | 18. Knock-out Slots for Wireless Antennas

Tower: 1. Width 6.1″ (15.4cm) | 2. Depth 10.8″ (27.4cm) | 3. Height 13.8″ (35cm) | Minimum Weight 17.49 lb (7.93kg) ​

  • ESSENTIAL FEATURES AT A GREAT VALUE
  • Discover the important monitor features you need to drive productivity every day with this 18.5” monitor.
  • • Enjoy easy compatibility with legacy PCs via
  • VGA connectivity.
  • • Create AIO-like simplicity in deployment by mounting a
  • Dell Wyse thin client or Dell Optiplex Micro PC directly
  • to available rear VESA mount area.
  • • Suit your viewing preference with this monitor’s
  • tilt feature
  • ECO-CONSCIOUS DESIGN
  • Rest assured that the Dell 19 Monitor meets the latest environmental and energy efficiency standards.
  • • Help reduce your organization’s carbon footprint
  • and environment impact with this environmentally
  • compliant monitor.
  • • Conserve power with Power Nap, a feature found in
  • Dell Display Manager.
  • • BFR/PVC-free monitor (excluding external cables)
  • with arsenic-free glass and mercury-free LED panel.
  • • ENERGY STAR® and EPEAT® Silver compliant.

item.title: Dell Vostro 3670 Mini Tower...
item.dc:creator: qwerty
item.description: Performance workhorse Packed with power: Blast through your workload quickly and efficiently with up to 8th Gen Intel® Core™ i7 processors and up to 8GB DDR4 memory. With six cores, your performance gets a serious boost and you can do more at once in less time. More multi-tasking: Run multiple apps faster and enjoy sharp, high-quality visuals […]
item.content:encoded:
Performance workhorse

Packed with power: Blast through your workload quickly and efficiently with up to 8th Gen Intel® Core i7 processors and up to 8GB DDR4 memory. With six cores, your performance gets a serious boost and you can do more at once in less time.

More multi-tasking: Run multiple apps faster and enjoy sharp, high-quality visuals on everything from PowerPoint presentations to video edits with up to 2GB GDDR5 NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 graphics.

Easy expansion: Get up to 1TB of solid state storage for easy access to all the files, photos and videos you need. Supports up to 2GB GDDR5 NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 graphics.

Desk-friendly designCool factor: The unique mesh design on the front of the system incorporates additional vents, for reduced dust, faster cooling and an overall improvement in performance. Color options vary by region.

Space saver: With a small footprint, the Vostro tower leaves plenty of desk space open while keeping ports within easy reach.

Seamless securityEncryption de-mystified: Enjoy commercial-grade security including Hardware TPM 2.0—hardware protection and storage for encryption keys that verify your device as unique and trusted.

Restricted access: Be assured that unauthorized users aren’t accessing your systems thanks to Bitlocker, offering options for multi-factor authentication and system lock-down without the appropriate personal identification number (PIN).

Ports & Slots

1. ODD LED Lens | 2. Optical Drive | 3. Power On Button | 4. HDD LED Lens | 5. SD Card | 6. Universal Audio Jack | 7. USB 3.0 Ports (2) | 8. Line In/Out | 9. HDMI | 10. VGA Connector | 11. USB 2.0 Ports (4) | 12. Gigabit Ethernet | 13. Expansion Slots (4) | 14. Security Cable Slot | 15. Power Supply Unit

item.title: Lenovo Legion Y530 Gaming...
item.dc:creator: qwerty
item.description: The bulky gaming laptops of old are gone, and now is the time to embrace a machine that is worthy of you—stylish on the outside, savage on the inside. At 24 mm and 2.3 kg, the Lenovo Legion Y530 Laptop was redesigned to deliver the ideal balance between epic gaming performance and practical portability. Take […]
item.content:encoded:
The bulky gaming laptops of old are gone, and now is the time to embrace a machine that is worthy of you—stylish on the outside, savage on the inside. At 24 mm and 2.3 kg, the Lenovo Legion Y530 Laptop was redesigned to deliver the ideal balance between epic gaming performance and practical portability.

Take your games to the edge

 

With its thin bezels, the Y530 packs more than 2 million pixels into a near-edgeless 15-inch FHD display. Combined with up to 144 Hz refresh rate, 300 nits of brightness, and an IPS Antiglare screen, this laptop brings your favorite games to life, for breathtakingly immersive gameplay on the go.

Designed for what’s next

The Y530 features Intel’s high-performance 8th Gen Intel® Core mobile processors, delivering the ultimate on-the-go performance with support for Intel® Optane Technology—optimized to game the way you do, with up to six cores and 12 threads for high-end gaming and pro-level content creation.

Essential graphics for every gamer

 

  • The Y530 is a true gaming rig, powered by NVIDIA® Pascal-the most advanced GPU architecture ever created. This advanced GPU boosts performance in high-definition and supports DirectX12 features to deliver super-fast, smooth and power-efficient gameplay. The Y530 comes loaded with even more innovative NVIDIA® game-ready technologies that let you experience the latest titles in their full immersive glory.

More muscle per millimeter

Expert craftsmanship extends beyond design. The Y530 represents the culmination of thousands of engineering hours to deliver a laptop that is both powerful and thin. Incorporating DDR4 memory, PCIe SSD storage, and more, our engineers combined their expertise in battery, I/O placement, thermals, and motherboard design to pack the best hardware into one powerful gaming laptop.

Precision keys for precision commands

Your keyboard is the first and last thing you’ll touch during a serious gaming session, so its details matter. The Y530 delivers a full-sized, white-backlit, high-response keyboard and number pad with 1.7 mm of key travel, for the most ergonomic and comfortable gaming experience.

Run silent, run cool

Heat, the nemesis of gaming performance, is not a problem with the remastered Y530. It features a dual-channel thermal system, offering multiple benefits: individual CPU and GPU cooling, for cooler system temperatures; four thermal vents, for improved airflow; and 70 individual fan blades per channel, to reduce system noise.

Get more from your entertainment

Dolby Audio Premium energizes your entertainment with rich, powerful sound. It dynamically adjusts audio to deliver home theater quality in a virtual surround sound experience for all your entertainment. Boosted bass and enhanced volume turn it all up for sound that’s loud and clear enough to share.

Tech Specs

Processor
  • 8th Generation Intel® Core i7-8750H
Operating System
Windows 10 Home
Display
15.6″ FHD (1920 x 1080) IPS (up to 144 Hz, 300 nits)
Graphics
  • NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050Ti
Battery
52.5 WHr
Memory
16GB DDR4 2666 MHz
Storage
  •  1TB HDD 16GB Intel® Optane-Ready
Audio
Harman® speakers with Dolby Audio
Ports
  • 3 USB 3.1 Type-A
  • USB 3.1 Type-C
  • Mini DisplayPort 1.4
  • HDMI 2.0
  • RJ-45
  • Audio combo jack
  • NOVO hole
Connectivity
  • WiFi 2×2 AC + Bluetooth® 4.2
  • WiFi 1×1 AC + Bluetooth® 5.0
Dimensions (W x D x H) 14.37″ x 10.24″ x 0.95″ (365 mm x 260 mm x 24.2 mm)
Weight Starting at 5.1 lbs (2.3 kg)

item.title: HP PAVILION 14 BK002NE 2CH75EA...
item.dc:creator: qwerty
item.description: HP Pavilion laptop sports a stunning silver finish. You can buy this HP Windows 10 laptop here at Souq.com.The HP Pavilion 14-bk002ne Laptop is loaded with powerful features. With its modern and sophisticated design, this HP laptop maintains the perfect balance between style and performance. The 14inch display delivers lifelike visuals at an impressive resolution […]
item.content:encoded:
HP Pavilion laptop sports a stunning silver finish. You can buy this HP Windows 10 laptop here at Souq.com.The HP Pavilion 14-bk002ne Laptop is loaded with powerful features. With its modern and sophisticated design, this HP laptop maintains the perfect balance between style and performance. The 14inch display delivers lifelike visuals at an impressive resolution of 1920 x 1080 pixels. With up to 10 hours 25 minutes of battery life, you will never have to rush to the charger in the middle of the presentation. This HP Pavilion laptop is preinstalled with Windows 10 operating system that offers a familiar feel and a host of exciting features so that you can work confidently and creatively. The Intel Core i5-7200U Dual-Core processor give this laptop enough firepower to speed through all high-end tasks. Furthermore, the NVIDIA GeForce 940MX graphics card accelerates the performance of the system to handle demanding games and editing applications. This HP Windows 10 laptop incorporates a 12GB RAM that delivers flawless multitasking. Moreover, the internal memory of 1TB allows you to save loads of files without the worry of running out of space. Available in a silver finish, this HP i5 laptop exudes a polished and sharp look.

PHYSICAL FEATURES

KEY FEATURES

Intel Core i5-7200U

IMMERSIVE EXPERIENCE

  • 14inch display delivers crystal-clear images and visuals with a vibrant quality of 2 million pixels
  • Impressive resolution of 1920 x 1080 pixels gives all your favorite media content a new dimension
  • IPS technology provides excellent clarity even from wide angles
  • Anti-glare coating on the display gives you a clear view even when you are working under a bright light
  • Dual HP Speakers, custom tuning by the experts at B and O PLAY and HP Audio Boost give you a rich, authentic audio experience

UNMATCHED PERFORMANCE

  • 7th generation, Intel Core i5-7200U Dual-Core processor offers excellent efficiency, no matter the task
  • 12GB DDR4 SDRAM module offers incredible responsiveness to give you a seamless multitasking experience
  • 1TB internal memory allows you to store large files and high-end games without the worry of running out of space
  • NVIDIA GeForce 940MX graphics adapter enhances the visual performance of the system without hampering the battery life
  • 3-cell, 41Whr Li-Ion, with battery fast-charge support, can charge from 0 to 90 percent in just 90 minutes
  • Windows 10, with its updated features, new innovations, and security capabilities, gives you an incredible user experience

FASTER AND VERSATILE CONNECTIVITY

  • USB 3.1 Type-C Gen 1 allows you to share data with USB Type-C enabled devices at incredible speeds
  • 2 USB 3.1 Gen 1 ports lets you plug in external flash drives and HDDs
  • HDMI port for sharing laptop screen with high-end displays and projectors
  • Intel 802.11b/g/n/ac WiFi allows you to access the home internet for fast downloading and video streaming
